document_data.caption: Watchway Tower, labeled as "Guard Tower", on a map of Waterdeep, ca. [[1368 DR]]
document_data.name: Watchway Tower
document_data.location: [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Watchway Tower''' was one of the major torchtowers of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Trollwall]], located in the city's graveyard district, the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]].Every tower connected to the Trollwall falls under the designation of "torchtower."<ref group="note" name="major">The sourcebook ''[[City System]]'' states that all torchtowers with names are "major towers".
document_data.Location: This tower was located at the northeastern corner of the City of the Dead. Outside of the City of the Dead, in the [[North Ward of Waterdeep]], its exterior stood at the southern end of the walkway known as the [[Cliffwatch]].<ref>

Structure.Interior: Being a torchtower,<ref group="note" name="torchtower" /> Watchway Tower had all the features that were common among them. This included a debriefing room, a small armory, holding cells, storage rooms for the holding of evidence or confiscated items, some bedchambers, and some garderobes.{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-10-17 - Waterdeep's Torchtowers}} Additionally, being a major torchtower, it had six small holding cells that could hold up to ten people, which were used in times of trouble.<ref><ref group="note" name="major" />

document_data.Activities: Like all other torchtowers, this structure had three beacon-fires that were constantly kept on standby.
document_data.Inhabitants: Watchway Tower, like all torchtowers, was manned by members of the City Watch, who carefully watched over the edge of the Cliffwatch for any sign of invasion.<ref> Four members of the Watch were always stationed inside of the tower, while one was posted outside to watch for any trouble in the nearby alleyways abutting the City of the Dead.
